snippet.title: From Idea to (almost) Finished Game | Swamp Up Devlog #0
snippet.description:
🐸 Wishlist Swamp Up on Steam now! 🍄 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2807240/?utm_source=yt&utm_content=dl0

🔔 Please don't forget to Like & Subscribe! 🔔

In this indie game devlog, we dive into the journey of how we get into game development, how we make our indie game from scratch, the initial concepts, mechanics, environment, enemies, 3D art, behind-the-scenes and the step by step of the development process, from prototype to current state.

Check how our plans changed from a two-week "self game jam" to 9 months developing this game project, including marketing and publishing.

This game is a fast-paced yet relaxing 3D Precision Platformer, that uses procedural generation for the maps, and blends elements of endless runners. You can jump between mushrooms, gather Power-ups, dodge Enemies, earn Emblems to spend in Upgrades, and break distance and time Records!
The game is made with Unreal Engine 5.1, for PC, and is available to wishlist on Steam!

Let me know, what do you want to see in the next devlog?


Twitter: https://twitter.com/Torress_Studios
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@torress_studios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Torress_Studios
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/xFhWgwUrsS


🎬 Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:27 - The Idea
2:56 - The Environment
3:59 - The Enemies
5:46 - The Art
6:17 - Wishlist Swamp Up on Steam!


🎶 Music used in the Teaser:
"What's Going On?!", by Alexandr Zhelanov: https://www.youtube.com/c/AlexandrZhelanovsMusic

#gamedev ​​​​#indiegame #indiedev ​​#devlog #gamedevelopment #unrealengine5 #3dplatformer
